summary: Federal agencies participating in the Small Business Innovation Research and Small Business Technology Transfer programs awarded over $3 billion to small businesses in FY 2020 to develop and commercialize new technologies. Generally, Small Business Administration policy calls for businesses to be notified of an award within 90 days and to receive it within 180 days. Award timeliness has improved overall since FY 2017. However, 20...
title: Small Business Research Programs: Agencies Should Further Improve Award Timeliness
